attributes.action: Immediately lift visa restrictions for Ukrainian nations fleeing Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Immediately lift visa restrictions for Ukrainian nations fleeing Ukraine
attributes.background: Immediately lift visa restrictions for Ukrainian nations fleeing Ukraine. Creating a safe passage for those fleeing conflict

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
